overview:
Anas Kamtiyono, The owner of Sevenroots Media. He is a happy and simple blogger from Indonesia. He is dreaming to have a big media site with lot of follower. So he built Sevenroots Media since late of June 2011.

Things he loves while online is blogging and reading about blogging. He also an active social networking user. He have accounts on Twitter, Facebook, Google +, LinkedIn where he try to promote articles on his Media site.

Beside having big passion in blogging and social media, he love Design much too. He love to use Photoshop to do all his project, not other software because he never get used to them anymore. Designing CD and Books cover is done by his hand. He love simple but appealing design.

Because blogging is flowing in his blood, he also learn some ability to make design of his blog that most of them using WordPress. There already one free theme over Sevenroots Media called 16+ available for download. While he use Adobe Photoshop for graphical design, he often use Programmers Notepad to write code.
